jd:
Hi,
This is Chandra from Yochana IT Solutions, I Recently found your resume in one of our Job portal and We are looking for “Dot Net Developer, Raleigh, NC(Onsite)” with one of our client, I have included the job information below, If you are interested, please share your updated resume.

Job Description:
8+ years of extensive experience in .Net, .Net Core, SQL, C#, ASP.Net.
Strong SQL writing skills and SQL server knowledge
Should be able to lead the team well
Strong experience in Angular is added advantage
Extensive experience in HTML, XML and JavaScript
Should have strong understanding of all the aspects of software development cycle
Excellent verbal communication skills
Excellent critical thinking problem analysis to resolution skills
Needs to have good experience in Waterfall Agile methodology

(1.) To be responsible for providing technical guidance / solutions ;define, advocate, and implement best practices and coding standards for the team.
(2.) To develop and guide the team members in enhancing their technical capabilities and increasing productivity
(3.) To ensure process compliance in the assigned module| and participate in technical discussions/review as a technical consultant for feasibility study (technical alternatives, best packages, supporting architecture best practices, technical risks, breakdown into components, estimations).
(4.) To prepare and submit status reports for minimizing exposure and risks on the project or closure of escalations.
